en.hero.title: A Green Economy Toolkit
en.hero.description1: South Africa and the world are switching to green economy, and that is creating a lot of opportunities for businesses in the renewable, repair and remanufacturing sectors.
en.hero.description2: We want to share these opportunities with you, so we help people who are entrepreneurs grow their economy fund 10 x faster. The Green Economy Toolkit helps governments and institutions to plan their green economy transition. From insights, green business bank you will find green information, support and development to transition their conventional business models into green economy.
en.hero.description3: We help you together a step-by-step guide on how to access the benefits of a green economy and position your business to operate in a greener global.

zu.footer.copyright: © 2025 Inethiwekhi Yomnotho Oluhlaza. Wonke amalungelo agodliwe.
zu.hero.title: Ithuluzi Lomnotho Oluhlaza
zu.hero.description1: INingizimu Afrika nomhlaba wonke bayashintshela emnothweni oluhlaza, futhi lokho kwenza amathuba amaningi amabhizinisi emikhakheni yokuvuselela, ukulungisa kanye nokukhiqiza kabusha.
zu.hero.description2: Sifuna ukwabelana ngala mathuba nawe, ngakho sisiza abantu abangosomabhizinisi ukuthi bakhulise imali yabo yomnotho ngokushesha okuphindwe kayi-10. Ithuluzi Lomnotho Oluhlaza lisiza ohulumeni nezikhungo ukuthi zihlele ushintsho lwazo lomnotho oluhlaza. Kusukela emibonweni, ibhange lamabhizinisi aluhlaza uzothola ulwazi oluhlaza, ukusekelwa kanye nentuthuko yokushintsha amamodeli wabo wamabhizinisi ajwayelekile abe umnotho oluhlaza.
zu.hero.description3: Sikusiza ukuhlanganisa umhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo sokuthi ungalufinyelela kanjani izinzuzo zomnotho oluhlaza futhi ubeke ibhizinisi lakho ukuze lisebenze emnothweni oluhlaza womhlaba.

tn.footer.live_events_calendar: Khalendara ya ditiragalo tse di phelang
tn.footer.copyright: © 2025 Marangrang a Moruo o Motala. Ditokelo tsotlhe di bolokilwe.
tn.hero.title: Sediriswa sa Moruo o Motala
tn.hero.description1: Aforika Borwa le lefatshe ka bophara di fetogela moruong o motala, mme seo se bopa ditšhono tse dintsi tsa dikgwebo mo lekaleng la tsa go tsosolosa, go lokisa le go dira botlhaswa.
tn.hero.description2: Re batla go arolelana ditšhono tse le wena, ka jalo re thusa batho ba ba leng borakgwebo go godisa tshekelo ya bona ya moruo ka lebelo le le kalo ka makgetlo a lesome. Sediriswa sa Moruo o Motala se thusa dipuso le ditheo go rala phetohelo ya bona ya moruo o motala. Go tswa mo dinakong, banka ya dikgwebo tse di tala o tla bona tshedimosetso e e tala, tshegetso le tswelopelo ya go fetola mekgwa ya bona ya dikgwebo tse di tlwaelegileng go moruo o motala.
tn.hero.description3: Re go thusa go bokana tataiso ya mogato ka mogato ya gore o ka nna jang o fitlhelela melemo ya moruo o motala le go beha kgwebo ya gago gore e dire mo moruong o motala wa lefatshe.
